    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationSet

        public AnimationSet(org.newdawn.slick.Animation[] anim,
            java.lang.String[] val)
        AnimationSet is a utility class that makes a set of any number of Animation instances. This constructor is to be used if you have an existing set of Animation instances and their names.
        Parameters:
        anim - An existing set of Animation instances.
        val - The corresponding names of the instances.
        See Also:
        Animation

      • AnimationSet

        public AnimationSet()
        AnimationSet is a utility class that makes a set of any number of Animation instances. This constructor is to be used if you just want to create a blank set of Animation instances.
        See Also:
        Animation

    • Method Detail

                java.lang.String animName,
                org.newdawn.slick.Animation anim)
        Adds an animation to the set.
        Parameters:
        i - The animation ID that should be given.
        animName - The name of the animation.
        anim - The Animation instance to add.
        See Also:
        Animation

      • getAnimation

        public org.newdawn.slick.Animation getAnimation(int i)
        Gets an Animation from the set.
        Parameters:
        i - The animation ID.
        Returns:
        The Animation instance, or null if the id is invalid.
